title: LIVE from Toronto: Eddie Redmayne, Alicia Vikander Talk ‘The Danish Girl’
content:
Stay tuned for Variety’s live conversation with “The Danish Girl” stars Eddie Redmayne, Alicia Vikander and director Tom Hooper. The transgender drama, which premiered Saturday night at the Toronto Film Festival, hits theaters Nov. 27. Watch the stream via Samsung’s mobile Live Broadcast:      
   …
